summary: Makes hair visible for helmets and hats. I left hoods alone. NOTE that there is clipping depending on your hair. This was meant for more short hair, like the buzz cut or Redguard small afro. NO WIGS!!! Just new helmets and hats that allow hair to show.
descriptionHtml:
"Aye, that I do. I've got to, if I hope to be as good as Eorlund Gray-Mane some day." Adrianne Avenicci

And she has, Helmets and Hats with that womans touch. No more bunched up hair, no more invisible hair, you want it she has it.

What this mod does is make alternative helmets and hats that will show hair under them, instead of them becoming invisible. No hoods, No wigs, just pure natural hair. Works with Apachii sky hair and vanilla, should work other hair mods too.

You can Craft them, or if you want to be impatient, in Warmaidens, behind the counter are chests.
Download all three files to have all helmets and hats. Instead No other requirments, except for dawnguard for the dawnguard gear and Dragonborn for the Dragonborn Gear. That is all.

The replacer version only uses the normal helmets and hats. None of the enchanted ones. Plus you should still be able to craft them and enchant them yourselves.

SPECIAL NOTE::: There will be CLIPPING of hairs depending on the hair you use. This is not a major fix on this all this does is allow hair to be seen under the helmet that used to become invisible once wearing helmets or hats.

Helmets:
Ancient Nord -------- Penitus Oculatus
Blades ----- Scaled
DragonScale ----- - Steel
Elven Heavy ------ Steel Horned
Elven Light ------ Wolf
Falmer* ------ DawnGuard Light
Glass ------ Nordic
Helm Of YnGol ----- Stahlrim Heavy
Hide ----- Stahlrim Light
Imperial
Imperial Light
Imperial Officer
Iron
Jagged Crown
Leather

Hats:
Chef Hat
Fine Hat
Jester Hat
Merchant Hat
Mourners Hat
White Hat
Skaal Hat

BUGS:
Falmer Helmet works but is not lined up.

All helmets work for Male and Female Humanoid and Elves, but Khajiit, Argonian, and Orcs are as follow.

All helmets and hats work with Orc except Steel-Steel Horned- and Wolf helmets.

All helmets and hats work with Khajiit except Ancient Nord-Falmer-Iron-Steel-Steel Horned-and Wolf Helmets.

These helmets and hats only work with Argonian:
Elven Heavy ----- Chef Hat
Elven Light ----- Fine Hat
Falmer* ----- Jester Hat
Glass ----- Mourners Hat
Leather ----- White Hat
Nordic ----- Skaal Hat



CHANGELOG:
Readded the old file for users, who would like to use the old version before I get done with the new version. I am in the process of other mods, and will look to getting this done soon. Thanks for the support.

4.5: Replacer Version for Vanilla is now done, hats and helmets all work. I did not touch the falmer helmet as Im still working on it on the standalone. Not sure what to expect with Orcs khajiit and argonians.

4.0 Totally Redone, created custom helmets and hats that wont affect NPCs. Added other helmets as well. All Helmets and hats work except Falmer, it works, just doesn't line up.

3.0 Added Dragonborn, must have Dawnguard as well. Only Nordic helmet is not working. Stahlrim and Skaal hat works.
author: Jrew
